name: 杜敏誠
objective: This course will introduce the basic concepts and operations of GIS. Students with no GIS experience are encouraged to enroll as hands-on experience is the focus of this class. Students are expected to be able to utilize GIS in their research and future employment and understand the full potential of GIS technologies.
